products.name: Bodybuilding
products.description:
Bodybuilding is the use of progressive resistance exercise to control and develop one's muscles (muscle building) by muscle hypertrophy for aesthetic purposes. Bodybuilding, weight training and aerobic exercise increase self-esteem, improve your health and body, lift your mood, reduce stress and frustration, improve your sleeping patterns, distract your mind from worries and difficult life events and situations, help you gain control of your life, body and mind.
Going to the gym can relieve stress, anxiety and depression. Seeing real results can improve your mood and give you a sense of satisfaction to further progress and develop through fitness. Bodybuilding can enhance your self-esteem and confidence by giving you a more positive outlook on your own image.

products.name: HIIT
products.description:
High-intensity interval training is a training protocol alternating short periods of intense or explosive anaerobic exercise with brief recovery periods until the point of exhaustion, which thereby relies on "the anaerobic energy releasing system almost maximally.
HIIT helps people to burn fat and carbohydrates within a short period of activity. People who do HIIT may also benefit from a revved up metabolism post-workout. HIIT has been shown to increase resting energy expenditure, which means your body is continuing to burn calories at an elevated rate even after you exercise.

products.name: Cross-Fit
products.description: Crossfit is based on a series of functional trainings, which are performed at a high degree of intensity and which have the role of increasing resistance and strengthening the muscles, thus improving physical condition. A main feature of this type of training is the execution of exercises in intervals, addressing different types of movements. This strategy is more effective because the body will not get used to a single type of exercise and the muscles will be taken by surprise each time.

products.name: Yoga
products.description: Yoga is essentially a discipline based on achieving harmony between mind and body. It is both an art and a science of healthy living. On a tangible level, yoga is an ancient form of physical exercise that emphasizes body strength, flexibility, and breathing techniques to improve both emotional and physical well-being. The most important components of this practice are the yoga poses, designed to increase the strength and flexibility of the body.

products.name: Cycling
products.description:
Cycling is an excellent cardio workout, similar to jogging and aerobics classes.
Through this method, you work, first of all, your leg muscles, which are put to work seriously during increasingly accelerated pedaling. Calves, quadriceps, glutes: during cycling sessions, you will tone your legs in an efficient way.

products.name: Zumba
products.description:
Zumba is a fitness program inspired by Latin dances.
It involves a combination of elements related to dance and elements from the sphere of aerobics. Zumba choreography incorporates moves from hip-hop, soca, samba, salsa, merengue, reggaeton, mambo, martial arts, and even Bollywood, namely belly dancing. Squat and stretching exercises are also included.
Zumba is a good workout for your mental health because it causes the release of endorphins and neurotransmitters that can improve mood and eliminate stress hormones from the body.

products.name: TRX
products.description:
TRX provides a fast, effective full-body workout that helps develop and strengthen the "core" area and increase muscle endurance. It's a smart training system that uses gravity and body weight for hundreds of exercises. You decide how much you want each exercise to challenge you, you can quickly adjust your body position to increase or decrease the resistance.
Trx is recommended in recovery training for those who have problems with their wrists or back

products.name: TAEKWONDO
products.description:
Taekwondo, Tae Kwon Do or Taekwon-Do is a Korean form of martial arts characterized by punching and kicking techniques, with emphasis on head-height kicks, spinning jump kicks, and fast kicking techniques. The literal translation for tae kwon do is "kicking," "punching," and "the art or way of."
The goal of this martial art is to give a sense of self-esteem, knowledge of self-defense, heightened mental and physical well being. These assets attribute to a common goal of harmony.

products.name: AEROBICS
products.description:
Aerobics is a form of physical exercise that combines rhythmic aerobic exercise with stretching and strength training routines with the aim of improving all elements of fitness (flexibility, muscular strength and cardiovascular fitness).
Aerobics includes exercises during which oxygen consumption is higher than the rest of the time. Even the word "aerobic" means "in the presence of oxygen." These types of exercises are of moderate intensity, therefore they can be sustained for a few minutes, their purpose being to improve the general state of health.
